title: Can't save messages to Sent folder
content: I am having periodic problems with Thunderbird not saving sent messages to my Sent folder. I've read the threads on this site but they don't quite address my problem. I'm not using gmail but rather a proprietary email address, so I'm not sure about the instruction to uncheck "save to Sent folder". Also, as stated above, the problem is intermittent. Just at the moment my messages are being saved as expected but often (all day yesterday) they aren't and I get a message to say it couldn't save to sent folder and to try again, save or cancel. Is this a problem at my end or is it a server issue? Thanks for any help you can offer.
creator: com12

title: Thunderbird server syncronisation
content: Dear Sir/Madame, I am looking for a solution to can syncronise Tunderbird with mail server after deleting big amount of mails in Thunderbird. Unfortunately due to the current setup these mails were not deleted from the mail server, still occupying large space of storage. Is there a way to make a sync, where only those mails will stay on the server, which were left in the Thunderbird client after cleaunp?
creator: SumoBot

title: Emails from one of my gmail accounts skip the trash folder when I delete them and they vanish completely
content:
I have a few Gmail accounts in Thunderbird, all have the same settings in Thunderbird as well as in Gmail. But one of the accounts seems to be having some sync issues with the trash folder. If I delete an email it skips the trash folder and vanishes, nowhere to be found if I happen to be needing it.

I tried removing and adding the account a few times in Thunderbird, but it hasn't solved the issue. I tried disabling and enabling IMAP on the Gmail side and nothing changes.

And what is curious is that all the other accounts do not have this problem.

If anyone has any idea of what I should try I would greatly appreciate it.

Thank you!
creator: bogdan14

title: Unknown identity / Add security exception rule/ during login to my email @t-online.de with Thunderbird Version 102.6.1
content:
Dear Thunderbird Help Team,

since 3rd January 2023 I get a warning message from Thunderbird during login to my @t-online.de each time I try to read my mails.

I am using Thunderbird 102.6.1 (64) On Windows 10 Home PC with latest Edition Windows 10 Home Version 22H2 Installiert am ‎13.‎04.‎2022 Betriebssystembuild 19045.2486 Leistung Windows Feature Experience Pack 120.2212.4190.0

Please see the attached warning message (in German). In my translation of the warning says: "Add security exception rule.... The certificate is not trusted because it has not been verified to have been issued by a trusted authority using a secure signature..."

If I view into the certificate I read the following, see screenshot attached.

I now would not like to accept the security exception permanently. I think this is best practice not to accept such a exception?

Dear help community, do you have any help to fix this issue please? Kind regards
creator: nare73

title: Authentication not working for Siteground email account
content: I have various email accounts. One is working fine, with both SSL/TSS for in and outgoing servers. 3 other accounts, with the same password for all four accounts. The accounts that I want to add, which are accounts that worked find on a previous installation of TB, give messages that the password in failing and request the password over and over again, while not entering the accounts. In TB settings, security, all cookies are accepted. I see no difference between the set up of the accounts that works and the three accounts that fail. All four have SSl/TSL on both in- and outgoing servers and normal "password" setup.
creator: DaanVreugdenhil

title: CONFIGURAZIONE PEC
content:
Buongiorno, ho configurato la mia casella PEC in Thunderbird con server IMAP: sono riuscito a scaricare senza problemi la posta in arrivo, ma non riesco a scaricare la posta inviata. Ho verificato le impostazioni IMAP e SMTP e sono corrette come indicato dal gestore. Infine ho chiamato l'assistenza del mio provider, ma mi ha risposto di contattare voi per risolvere il problema. La PEC in questione è di Aruba.

Grazie Distinti saluti Ing. Federico Carro

[INFORMAZIONI RIMOSSE]
creator: studiotecnico.carro

creator: tfaranyos

title: Disk Space usage discrepancy
content:
Hi,

I am running Thunderbird 102.6.1 on Mac OS X Ventura.

The client runs perfectly but for one major issue that I have googles and tried to find an answer for.

I have a single Thunderbird profile which uses just over 360GB of space on my hard drive. When I check on Google Business and check my user, my entire user profile which includes ALL email and Documents is only 76GB.

I can find no reason why Thunderbird is using 360GB of space on the hard drive as it is essentially a mirror of my Google Business email account using imap.

I also have automatic compacting set in Thunderbird and that is what alerted me to the space issue as it now gives the error message that there is not enough space to compact mail folders.

Any help on this is appreciated!

Thank you
creator: subnero2001

title: outgoing server may be unavailable or is refusing smtp connections
content: HI, First we are in Australia and we have Optus for our email client/company. We have laptops. My husband's is a ASUS Zenbook running windows 11. I have an HP running windows 10. MY emails work fine. My husband's do not. The settings are the same on both our laptops for the outgoing server, and remember mine works fine, but not his. So why do you think that he cannot send the emails? They go through sometimes though. Last one was on 20 Dec 2022. But not today, 19 Jan 2023. It very frustrating as you can imagine. AND yes, we have it set up as per Optus instruction, but remember, MY emails can be sent. I'm thinking of deleting Thunderbird and reinstalling it, but not sure. I'm also thinking of going over to Outlook, but don't really like them. Can you help please? Cheers, Sandy
